trans-unit.source: Displays a single column header in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta um cabeçalho de coluna única num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: A column header is an item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control that contains heading text.
trans-unit.target: Um cabeçalho de coluna é um item num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo que contém o texto do cabeçalho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: ColumnHeader objects can be added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: ColumnHeader objetos podem ser adicionados a uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.Add%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To add a group of columns to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um grupo de colunas para uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.AddRange%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Index%2A> property of the ColumnHeader class to determine where the ColumnHeader is located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Index%2A>propriedade da classe ColumnHeader para determinar qual o ColumnHeader está localizado na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: ColumnHeader provides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> properties to set the text displayed in the control and the alignment of the text in the column header.
trans-unit.target: ColumnHeader fornece o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A>Propriedades a definir o texto apresentado no controlo e o alinhamento do texto no cabeçalho da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a ColumnHeader is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, you can reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ListView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se um ColumnHeader está associado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo, pode referenciar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ListView%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ListView%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If you want to copy a ColumnHeader for use in another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender copiar um ColumnHeader para utilização no outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Clone%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Clone%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> class with the image specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> classe com a imagem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The index of the image to display in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice da imagem a apresentar no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> class with the image specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> classe com a imagem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The key of the image to display in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave da imagem a apresentar no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resizes the width of the column as indicated by the resize style.
trans-unit.target: Redimensiona a largura da coluna, conforme indicado pelo estilo de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: Calling the AutoResize method is only effective once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> have been constructed, and the column is populated with items.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método AutoResize só está em vigor uma vez a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>e contém <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>ter sido criada, e a coluna é preenchida com itens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If new items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, the column will not resize unless AutoResize is called again.
trans-unit.target: Se forem adicionados novos itens para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, a coluna não redimensionará a menos que AutoResize seja novamente chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: A value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"></xref> is passed to the AutoResize method when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> property is a value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor diferente de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"> </xref> é transmitido ao método AutoResize quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>propriedade é um valor diferente de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: Creates an identical copy of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> that is not attached to any list view control.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia idêntica atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> que não está ligado a qualquer controlo de vista de lista.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to copy existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects from an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control for use in other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para copiar existente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objetos existente de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo para utilização noutras <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: An object representing a copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa uma cópia deste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display order of the column relative to the currently displayed columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ordem de apresentação da coluna relativamente às colunas atualmente apresentadas.

trans-unit.source: The display order of the column, relative to the currently displayed columns.
trans-unit.target: A ordem de apresentação da coluna, relativo às colunas atualmente apresentadas.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disposes dos recursos (que não seja memória) utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>para a memória foi occupying pode ser recuperada através da recolha de lixo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>está a utilizar não irá ser libertado até chamadas de recolha de lixo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>destrutor do objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice da imagem apresentada no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex property refers to the index of an image specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ImageIndex se refere ao índice de uma imagem especificado pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>que contém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex property returns -1 if there is no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> set on the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ImageIndex devolve -1 se não houver nenhuma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>definido no contentor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The image displayed in a column is typically used to indicate the state of items in the column.
trans-unit.target: A imagem apresentada numa coluna é normalmente utilizada para indicar o estado dos itens na coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A> and ImageIndex are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A>e ImageIndex são mutuamente exclusivos, que significa que o se estiver definido, o outro é definido como um valor inválido e ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The image associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is typically used to indicate the state information.
trans-unit.target: A imagem associada uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>é normalmente utilizado para indicar as informações de estado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: If you set the ImageIndex to a value greater than the index of the last item in the associated image list, ImageIndex will be set to the index of the last item in the image list.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o ImageIndex para um valor maior do que o índice do último item na lista de imagens associadas, ImageIndex será definida para o índice do último item na lista de imagens.

trans-unit.source: The index of the image displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice da imagem apresentada no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ImageIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: ImageIndex é inferior a -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the image displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a chave da imagem apresentada na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored.
trans-unit.target: O ImageKey e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A>propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas, que significa que o se estiver definido, o outro é definido como um valor inválido e ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If ImageKey is set to an invalid value, an image will not be displayed, and an exception will not be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se ImageKey estiver definido como um valor inválido, não será apresentada uma imagem e não será emitida uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The image associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is typically used to indicate the state information.
trans-unit.target: A imagem associada uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>é normalmente utilizado para indicar as informações de estado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: The key of the image displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: A chave da imagem apresentada na coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image list associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de imagem associada a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>Devolve o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>que contém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> of this column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a localização com o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>desta coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the column header within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: O valor desta propriedade não necessariamente corresponder à posição atual visual do cabeçalho da coluna dentro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This can be due to the user reordering the column headers at run time (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A> property is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: Isto pode dever-se o utilizador reordenação os cabeçalhos de coluna em tempo de execução (quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is not contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control this property returns a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>não está contido dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controla este procedimento propriedade devolve um valor de -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the column header within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control it is contained in.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do cabeçalho da coluna dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo se encontra contida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> is located in.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> está localizado na.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para determinar qual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar específico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objeto é associado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control that represents the control that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo que representa o controlo que contém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data to associate with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que contém dados para associar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data to associate with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém dados para associar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the column header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto apresentado no cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the column header.
trans-unit.target: O texto apresentado no cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the text displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento horizontal do texto apresentado no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to provide different text alignment settings for the text displayed in each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para fornecer definições de alinhamento para o texto apresentado em cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> de texto diferente

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Due to a limitation in the underlying control, this property has no effect on the first column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, which is always aligned to the left.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Devido a uma limitação no controlo subjacente, esta propriedade não tem efeito na primeira coluna no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo, que está sempre alinhado à esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To work around this limitation in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName> event and paint the column header yourself.
trans-unit.target: Para contornar esta limitação no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], pode processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>eventos e no cabeçalho da coluna de pintura por si.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Este método não deve ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> é sem nome.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura da coluna.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to set the Width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade permite-lhe definir a largura do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> can be set to adjust at run time to the column contents or heading.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>pode ser definido para ajustar em tempo de execução para o conteúdo da coluna ou o cabeçalho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: To adjust the width of the longest item in the column, set the Width property to -1.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar a largura do item na coluna mais longo, defina a propriedade Width como -1.

trans-unit.source: To autosize to the width of the column heading, set the Width property to -2.
trans-unit.target: Para autosize para a largura no cabeçalho da coluna, defina a propriedade largura -2.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Unexpected behavior can result when the combined width of all columns exceeds 32,768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um comportamento inesperado pode resultar quando a largura combinada de todas as colunas excede 32,768 pixéis.

trans-unit.source: The width of the column, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A largura da coluna, em pixels.
